EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-07-23 Partner Newsletter.ES-2018-07-23 Partner Newsletter
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic Partner Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
In This Issue Resources - Accreditation <[[#Section1]]> - News & Announcements <[[#Section2]]> - Promotions <[[#Section4]]> - Events <[[#Section3]]>
- Partner Portal <[[https://turbonomic.webinfinity.com/]]> - Deal Registration <[[https://turbonomic.webinfinity.com/]]> - Enablement <[[https://turbonomic.webinfinity.com/]]> - Marketing Tools & Resources <[[https://turbonomic.webinfinity.com/]]> Accreditation Earn Your Turbonomic Accreditation TODAY! Take Turbonomic Sales and Technical Accreditation anytime, anywhere, with our new online training courses. Whether you’re a Sales Consultant, Sales Engineer, or Systems Architect, we have a track that will quickly help you sell, position and deploy Turbonomic. Visit our Partner Portal to learn more! <[[https://turbonomic.webinfinity.com/]]>
Platinum Partners – if you are one of the first 50 individuals to take the Sales Engineer Accreditation Course, you will receive a $100 Amazon Gift Card.
News and Announcements Partners Can Now Dramatically Accelerate Microsoft Azure Adoption with Turbonomic Learn how you can leverage Turbonomic’s AI-powered decision engine to deliver fast and accurate assessment for Azure migrations, enabling continuous optimization of a hybrid cloud estate. The software automatically determines the exact CPU, memory and storage required by leveraging a holistic understanding of the resource needs of the entire IT environment, from the application down to the underlying infrastructure. Learn More <[[https://turbonomic.com/press-releases/microsoft-azure/]]>
Watch Gavriella Schuster, Microsoft Corporate Vice President and Commercial Partner of Channels & Programs, Discuss Turbonomic's Mission at Microsoft Inspire 2018 <[[https://vimeo.com/280446264#t=928s]]> Promotions Limited Time Offer – Q3 TurboBoost Campaign! Calling All Turbo Platinum Partners – earn a $100 Amazon Gift Card for every new customer meeting and a $300 Amazon Gift Card for every POV during the months of August, September and October*. Contact your Partner Director for additional details on this program and how you can sign up to participate!
*Rules and regulations apply. This program is only applicable for Platinum Partners.
Get $500 (USD) for Any New Logo You Bring to Turbonomic! We want to reward you, our partners, for your on-going support and commitment to Turbonomic with a new logo reward incentive. If you are a Gold or Platinum Partner, you are eligible to earn $500 for every new logo you close with Turbonomic. Below are the qualifications:
- Only partners with Gold or Platinum designation can participate in the program - Deal size must be a minimum of $50,000 (USD) - The opportunity must have an approved deal registration and close within 6 months of target closed date - Opportunities with Special Pricing over 50% do not qualify - New logos are defined as a company that has not purchased anything from Turbonomic in the last 2 years, and does not have an active user license with us today.
To learn if your opportunity applies for this reward, please reach out to your Turbonomic Account Rep, Partner Director or simply email PartnerDesk@Turbonomic.com <[[mailto:PartnerDesk@Turbonomic.com]]>. Events July 25 Webinar: Turbonomic and Azure Join us for a presentation and demo of Turbomonic’s fast, accurate AI-powered migration assessments and continuous optimization for Azure. By first optimizing workloads prior to migrating them to Azure, and then continuously optimizing compute, storage, and Azure SQL, Turbomonic assures that cloud applications get the resources they need to perform, at the optimal cost, and in compliance with policies. Register Here <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-azure/]]>.
July 31 – Aug 2 | CompTIA ChannelCon 2018 We are exhibiting at CompTIA ChannelCon in Washington, D.C., from July 31-August 2. Be our complimentary guest (a value of $1200) by registering here <[[https://cc18.snoball.events/e/turbonomic]]>! If your business builds, sells, influences or drives the adoption of technology, ChannelCon is the one event you don’t want to miss this year.
August 1 Webinar: Cloud Native, Kubernetes, Istio...Is the Hypervisor Irrelevant? Is the hypervisor irrelevant? Of course not. The hypervisor will continue to be a critical component in hybrid and multicloud. But, with the growing adoption of cloud native and distributed architectures, more and more organizations are focused on services and applications in their quest to digitally transform. How will this impact you? Register Here <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-native-hypervisor-webinar/]]>
Visit us at these upcoming events:
- August 2: AWS Summit Chicago - August 26-30: VMWorld 2018 - September 13: AWS Summit Atlanta
For a complete listing of upcoming Turbonomic events, please click here <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/events/]]>. Please visit the Partner Portal <[[https://turbonomic.webinfinity.com/]]>.
